about.label: About
about.intro: ARCAN Transactions SA specializes in investment property transactions in Switzerland.
about.text1: We operate exclusively in the institutional and professional segment, in direct contact with real estate market players.
about.text2: We support our customers - owners, investors, pension funds, family offices and developers - in the sale, acquisition and structuring of real estate transactions.

process.label: Our sales processes
process.title: Rigorous control of sales processes to

hero.label: Methodology
hero.description: Arcan Transactions SA manages the entire sales process to maximize the sale price of the asset, whether through a direct sale or a call for tenders, as an Asset Deal (sale of the property), a Share Deal (sale of the company) or a sale and lease-back.

mandate.description: The mandate type defines the framework of our collaboration and the terms of our involvement in the sale of your property.

simple.title: Simple Mandate
simple.description: The owner may appoint several intermediaries simultaneously. This option offers greater flexibility but can limit each intermediary’s level of investment.

exclusive.title: Exclusive Mandate
exclusive.description: Arcan Transactions SA is the sole intermediary appointed for the sale of the property. This exclusivity enables us to deploy all our resources and ensure an optimal approach and control.

directSale.label: Methodology
directSale.description: A targeted and confidential approach for fast, well-controlled transactions. Ideal for owners seeking discretion and speed.

exclusive.title: Exclusive
exclusive.description: The property is presented to a single prospect at the set price. The sale is completed only if the price is accepted, ensuring total confidentiality.

selective.title: Selective
selective.description: The property is presented at the set price to several qualified investors. The principle is simple: the first offer at the asking price gets the allocation (“first in, first served”).

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.label: Process & Timing
steps: Selection of one or more investor(s)

callForTenders.label: Methodology
callForTenders.description: A structured process to maximize value through competition. Recommended for assets with strong market potential.

selective.title: Selective
selective.description: For highly specific assets, it is advisable to limit the pool of potential investors to a few carefully selected prospects.

open.title: Open
open.description: For assets that are highly sought-after by the market, it is advisable to open the investor pool as widely as possible to create competition and optimize the sale price.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.label: Process & Timing
steps: Receipt of signed NDAs & sending of Information Memorandum
Receipt of NBO, selection of the short list & opening of the full data room
Review of the draft notarial deed

assetDeal.title: Asset Deal
assetDeal.subtitle: Sale of the property
assetDeal.p1: In an Asset Deal, it is the property itself that is sold.
assetDeal.p2: A sale of the property involves fewer risks for the investor, since only those related to the property are transferred to the buyer.
assetDeal.p3: Sale costs (notary, land registry, transfer taxes) are borne by the buyer, in accordance with customary practice.

shareDeal.title: Share Deal
shareDeal.subtitle: Sale of the company
shareDeal.p1: In a Share Deal, the shares of the company that owns the property are sold.
shareDeal.p2: A sale of the company offers financial and tax advantages for both seller and buyer. However, a more in-depth due diligence is required, as the buyer assumes all risks related to the company’s history.

saleLeaseback.title: Sale & Leaseback
saleLeaseback.subtitle: Sale-leaseback
saleLeaseback.p1: A sale and leaseback can take the form of either an Asset Deal or a Share Deal.
saleLeaseback.p2: In this particular case, the owner sells the property while remaining as a tenant. The most advantageous option for the principal must be determined: maximizing the sale price or, conversely, optimizing the lease terms.

legal.purposeText: The holding, purchase, sale, administration, management, rental, brokerage, operation, and property management of real estate, as well as the promotion and management of real estate projects and the granting of loans and guarantees to shareholders or third parties. The company may carry out, either on its own behalf or on behalf of third parties, all financial, commercial, movable or real estate operations directly or indirectly related to its corporate purpose and may participate, in any form, in any similar enterprises. The company may also establish branches and subsidiaries in Switzerland and abroad.
legal.privacyIntro: Arcan Transactions SA attaches great importance to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal data, in accordance with the Swiss Federal Data Protection Act (FADP) and, where applicable, the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
legal.dataCollectionText: We only collect personal data that you voluntarily provide to us, particularly through our contact form or by email (name, surname, email address, phone number). This data is necessary to respond to your requests and provide our services.
legal.dataUsageText: Your data is used exclusively within the framework of our business relationship. It is never sold to third parties. We may share certain information with trusted service providers (hosting, IT maintenance) only to the extent necessary for the performance of their duties.
legal.cookiesText: This site may use cookies to improve your browsing experience and analyze traffic (anonymous statistics). You can configure your browser to refuse cookies.
